<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_slackerbot_parser"> <x_snc_slackerbot_parser action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <activation_example>!lorem 10 words||para</activation_example> <active>true</active> <description>Lorem Ipsum Text Generator</description> <emoji/> <flags>gmi</flags> <regex>!lorem</regex> <script><![CDATA[ /** * Use the lipsum generator to generate Lorem Ipsum dummy paragraphs / words / bytes. * @param what in ['paras','words','bytes'], default: 'paras' * @param amount of paras/words/bytes, default: 2 (for words minimum is 5, for bytes it is 27) * @param start always start with 'Lorem Ipsum', default = true * activation_example: !lorem 10 words||paras||bytes **/
var wordCount = current.text.replace('!lorem','').trim().split(' ');
var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2(); rm.setHttpMethod('GET'); rm.setLogLevel('all'); rm.setEndpoint('https://www.lipsum.com/feed/json?start=yes&amount=' + wordCount[0] + '&what=' + wordCount[1]); var response = rm.execute(); var response_body = JSON.parse(response.getBody()); var loremText = response_body.feed.lipsum;
new x_snc_slackerbot.Slacker().send_chat(current, loremText);]]></script> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-10-03 03:35:15</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a6324df9479e99506eaffa37536d43e8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-10-03 21:31:38</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_slackerbot_parser> </record_update>

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_metadata_link action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <directory>update</directory>
        <documentkey>a6324df9479e99506eaffa37536d43e8</documentkey>
        <payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_slackerbot_parser">
    <x_snc_slackerbot_parser action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <activation_example>!lorem 10 words||para</activation_example>
        <active>true</active>
        <description>Lorem Ipsum Text Generator</description>
        <emoji/>
        <flags>gmi</flags>
        <regex>!lorem</regex>
        <script><![CDATA[	/**
	* Use the lipsum generator to generate Lorem Ipsum dummy paragraphs / words / bytes.	
	* @param what in ['paras','words','bytes'], default: 'paras'
	* @param amount of paras/words/bytes, default: 2 (for words minimum is 5, for bytes it is 27)
	* @param start always start with 'Lorem Ipsum', default = true
	* activation_example: !lorem 10 words||paras||bytes	
     **/


   var wordCount = current.text.replace('!lorem','').trim().split(' ');
    
	var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
	rm.setHttpMethod('GET');
	rm.setLogLevel('all');
	rm.setEndpoint('https://www.lipsum.com/feed/json?start=yes&amount=' + wordCount[0] + '&what=' +  wordCount[1]);
	var response = rm.execute();
	var response_body = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
	var loremText = response_body.feed.lipsum;


	new x_snc_slackerbot.Slacker().send_chat(current, loremText);]]></script>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-10-03 03:35:15</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>a6324df9479e99506eaffa37536d43e8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-10-03 21:31:38</sys_updated_on>
    </x_snc_slackerbot_parser>
</record_update>
</payload>
